description: This plan is perfect for someone who loves to talk! It has unlimited calls, but each SMS costs R0.50
This one is ideal for someone who prefers texting. It offers unlimited SMS, but each call costs R1.00 per minute.
This plan is a mix of both. You get 100 free SMS and 100 free call minutes. After that, each SMS costs R0.30 and each call minute costs R0.70
